Meet Our Team

Sardar Hossaini

CEO & Founder

Sardar is a visionary leader with over 5 years of experience in the industry. His dedication to excellence has been the driving force behind our success.

Zekrullah Askari

Chief Operating Officer

Zekrullah oversees our day-to-day operations, ensuring that our company runs smoothly and efficiently. He is committed to maintaining the highest standards in all aspects of our business.

Basir Payenda

Head of Marketing

Basir is the creative mind behind our marketing strategies. His innovative approach has helped us build a strong brand presence in the market.

Atlas Trends

Atlas Trends offers the latest in fashion trends with high-quality materials and modern designs. Our mission is to bring style and comfort to everyone.
